stimulusHtml: Which of the following may be considered a primary reason that African Americans migrated out of the South?

features.html:
• The map shows the following overall trends:

    • Decrease between 0 and 59% throughout the South

    • Decrease between 60 and 99.9% in small pockets throughout the Midwest

    • Increase between 0 and 59% along the southeast coast

    • Increase of 60% and over throughout much of the Northeast, West, and Southwest

Library of Congress

choicesHtml: They wanted to participate in the artistic innovations of the New Negro movement.
They sought safety from the dangers of lynching and other racial violence.
They were escaping the hate crimes and race riots of the Red Summer.
They wanted to pursue higher education opportunities at historically Black colleges and universities (HBCUs).
